activities: Medpace Bioanalytical Laboratories (MBL) provides bioanalytical services in all stages of drug development. MBL collects and processes data relating to worldwide clinical research studies. This data is collected and transferred to the United States in order to fulfill its business responsibilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
